description: A senior official at the club is placed under investigation over the player's citizenship bid.
title: Suarez case: Juventus director probed over footballer's Italian exam
title_page: Suarez case: Juventus director probed over footballer's Italian exam - BBC News
maintext: Announcing the results of an inquiry on Friday, chief prosecutor Raffaele Cantone said Juventus's management "took action, even at the highest institutional levels, to 'speed up' the granting of Italian citizenship for Suarez".
